description:
Make object pushable or/and pullable by another object.  

- Support **single** box object.
- Support **multi** box objects.
- User can set the weight of the box.
- Option (Yes/No) to make the boxes overlap.  

# Conditions
- Check if object is pushing.
- Check if object is pulling.  

# Actions
- Make objectA pushable by objectB.
- Make objectA Pullable by objectB.

# Example
![](https://i.imgur.com/C9HKvkz.png)
name: PushableAndPullableBox
shortDescription: Convert object to a pushable or/and pullable box.

eventsFunctions.description: Make object pushable by platformer character object.
eventsFunctions.name: Pushing

events.name: Player coming from left side of box
Player coming from right side of box

parameters.longDescription: This object will push the box.
parameters.name: Player

parameters.longDescription: The higher the value the lighter the box.
parameters.name: Weight

parameters.description: Boxes can overlap when being pushed into each other horizontally
parameters.name: Overlap

parameters.longDescription:
Select **any object** if you set the overlap to **Yes**.  
Select your **floor object** if you set the overlap to **No**.
parameters.name: Floor

parameters.longDescription:
-Set it to the same first **box object** if you **only have 1 box object**.  
-Set it to a **group of box objects** if you have **more than 1 box object**.
parameters.name: MultiBoxes

eventsFunctions.description: Make object pullable by platformer character object.
eventsFunctions.name: Pulling

events.name: Player coming from left side of box
Player coming from right side of box

parameters.longDescription: This object will pull the box.
parameters.name: Player

parameters.longDescription: The higher the value the lighter the box.
parameters.name: Weight

parameters.longDescription:
The distance between player and box object must be below this number in order to pull the box.  
Example: 10.
parameters.name: Distance

parameters.longDescription:
-Set it to the same first **box object** if you **only have 1 box object**.  
-Set it to a **group of box objects** if you have **more than 1 box object**.
parameters.name: MultiBoxes

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the player object is pushing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPushing

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the player object is pulling.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPulling
